text: The 1994 African Cup of Nations Final was a football match. It took place on 10 April 1994. It was the final match of the 19th edition of the Africa Cup of Nations. It was played in the Stade El Menzah in Tunis, Tunisia. Nigeria won its second championship. ==Road to the final== Nigeria Nigeria Zambia Zambia Opponents Results Opponents Results Group stage Group stage Group stage Group stage 3–0 0–0 0–0 1–0 Quarter-finals Quarter-finals Quarter-finals Quarter- finals 2–0 1–0 Semi-finals Semi-finals Semi-finals Semi-finals 2–2 4–0 ==Match== ===Details=== {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" GK 22 Peter Rufai RB 5 Uche Okechukwu CB 6 Uche Okafor CB 3 Ben Iroha LB 2 Augustine Eguavoen (c) CM 11 Emmanuel Amunike CM 10 Jay-Jay Okocha CM 15 Sunday Oliseh RF 7 Finidi George CF 14 Daniel Amokachi LF 9 Rashidi Yekini Substitutions: Substitutions: Substitutions: FW 13 Samson Siasia DF 19 Nduka Ugbade Manager: Manager: Manager: Clemens Westerhof Clemens Westerhof Clemens Westerhof Assistant referees: El-Jilali Rharib (Morocco) Abdel-Magid Hassan (Egypt) ==Other websites== *Final match details - worldfootball.net 11v11.com *Qualifications details - rsssf Final Category:1994 in association football Category:20th century in Tunisia
title: 1994 African Cup of Nations Final
